title: Strengthening Teaching Methodology Practical Competencies: Social Strategies for Improving Learning Engagement in War-Induced PTSD

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of psychology and pedagogy, including foundational knowledge of PTSD symptoms
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain the impact of PTSD symptoms on learning engagement.
Learners can design collaborative activities with peer learners using real-time social interaction techniques.
Learners can propose three or more classroom engagement strategies to reduce boredom.
Learners can suggest learning support measures for alleviating PTSD symptoms through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
